word_mean_info__list.difference: 指对看法有分歧的问题所表示较冷静和节制的态度，常常是经认真考虑后决定的。
普通用词，指对于事情的看法和采取的行动，多带不很显确或不便说明的感情色彩。
常指某人对某一问题的看法或立场，有时含个人感情色彩。
侧重指社会地位较高，工作较为庄重，领取工资的职位。
普通用词，指人的职务，职位，岗位。
指任何不分高低贵贱的职位；有时侧重指在政府、法庭所谋求的职位。
正式用词，一般指雇员或为富有人家工作所担任的职位，现多见于广告中。
一般特指戏剧或小说所写的环境或场所。
指或大或小的地方，既可指供专门用途或特定活动的地点，又可指某一事件的地址。
多指物体相对于其他物体所处的位置或状态。
指某物设置的方向或地点。
常指真实事件或虚构故事发生的地点。
指某物所处的客观位置和周围地区。
含义广泛，最普通用词，既可指很小的地点，又可指很大很远的地方或场所。
指物体在其周围环境中所处的位置或状态，侧重地点或场所的环境特征。
指相对较小的特定地点或事物所在地。

bilingual.source: Many people are trying to take my position.
bilingual.target: 许多人想要取代我的位置。

bilingual.source: It uses its eyes to measure the position of the sun.
bilingual.target: 它用眼睛测量太阳的位置。

bilingual.source: When the planet tilts, the position of the pole moves, too.
bilingual.target: 当地球倾斜时，极点的位置也会移动。

bilingual.source: The butterfly is aware of the time of day and the position of the sun in the sky.
bilingual.target: 蝴蝶知道一天中的时间和太阳在天空中的位置。

bilingual.source: No one is sure what Stonehenge was used for, but most agree that the position of the stones must be for a special purpose.
bilingual.target: 没有人确定巨石阵的用途，但大多数人认为石头的位置一定有特殊目的。
请告诉我你现在的位置。

bilingual.source: We use a dot to indicate the position.
bilingual.target: 我们用圆点来表示位置。

bilingual.source: The tank fired at the enemy's position.
bilingual.target: 坦克向敌人的位置开火。

bilingual.source: He found a comfortable position to sit.
bilingual.target: 他找到一个舒适的位置坐下。

list.abstract: position，这个属性定义建立元素布局所用的定位机制。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, you put me in this position.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，你把我放到这个位置上

yingyinNormal.en: Not just for the treasure within, but for where it lies, its strategic position.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不只是为了山里的财宝，更是为了它的战略位置。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies》

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, now holding sides of hearth in position, lower mantelpiece assembly onto top tabs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抓住壁炉两侧，固定好位置，将壁炉台组合至壁炉上方。

yingyinNormal.en: The knife, for example, is the last thing you learn. Okay? Okay. Position.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拿刀来举个例子，刀是你要学习的最后一件武器，明白吗？好的。找位置。

yingyinNormal.en: Leonard, where do you stand on giant rabbits and scrotal position? I honestly don't care.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德，你对巨型兔子和阴囊位置持啥态度？我一点都不在乎。

yingyinNormal.en: There are five people in the world who know the position of every ship in the Atlantic. They're all in this room.
yingyinNormal.zh: 世界上只有五个人知道，大西洋上每艘船的具体位置，他们全都在这里。

yingyinNormal.en: And I don't want to suggest your name to Jacobs unless you truly want the position. So I need to know now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除非你真想坐这个位置，不然我不会向雅各布斯提你的名，所以现在就告诉我。

yingyinNormal.en: You park on the edge of the Neutral Zone, you lock onto Harrison's position, you fire, you kill him and you haul ass.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你把飞船停在中立区边缘，然后锁定哈里森的位置，开火，杀了他就把飞船开回来。

yingyinNormal.en: Perhaps I'll make you my proposal for Galahad's position. Provided we can see eye to eye on certain political matters.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许我会任命你顶替加拉哈德的位置。如果我们在某些政治问题上能达成一致的话。

yingyinNormal.en: It was down by lightning at the time. But now it's resume to an upright position, to some sort of Magic, or other.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它是当时雷击倒的。不过现在它又被立起来移到原来的位置上了，被某种魔力或其他什么东西。

yingyinNormal.en: How do you slingshot your forces into an attack position on the blind side of this moon using the gravitational pull from this planet?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们该如何利用来自行星的引力，把战力输送到卫星背面抢占有利于进攻的位置？

yingyinNormal.en: 14? 14 is as high as they'll let any hosts go. You're in a management position. They want you to be smart. But not too smart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 才14？14是他们设置的接待员最高值了，你处于管理者的位置，他们想让你聪明些。但不能太聪明。

yingyinNormal.en: Ever the student of human nature. I wonder, what do you really feel? After all, in this moment, you are in a unique position.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你一直都是如此善于察言观色，我很想知道，你真实的感觉是什么？毕竟现在你处在一个特殊的位置上。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, our position is 34.48 degrees north, 118.31 west. That means the azimuth should be 168.22 degrees relative to magnetic north with an elevation of 49.93.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的位置是北纬34.48°，西经118.21°，这意味着方位角应该是相对磁北168.22°，外加仰角49.93°。

yingyinNormal.en: So if you were living on a world like Kepler-16b, you would see in the sky two stars rising in the east, setting in the west, continuously changing position as they orbit one another.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以如果你生活在一个像开普勒-16B这样的世界上，你会看到天上有两颗恒星东升西落，由于它们互相绕行，不断地变换着位置。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. It tells us that you participate in the mass cultural delusion that the sun's apparent position relative to arbitrarily defined constellations at the time of your birth, somehow affects your personality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，我们可以了解到，你有群众性文化妄想，就是指你出生时相对于任意确定星座的太阳的视位置，可能会决定你的性格。

yingyinNormal.en: I am sending horse soldiers to that position.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要派骑兵部队去那里。

yingyinNormal.en: What's your position on the bat vigilante in Gotham?
yingyinNormal.zh: 您对哥谭的蝙蝠义警持什么立场呢？

yingyinNormal.en: I need to speak to someone in position of authority.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要找你们最有份量的人说话。

yingyinNormal.en: Once all these pieces are in position... Triple Yahtzee?
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦所有的宝石都集齐了…然后就同花顺吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 领先地位；主导地位；领军位置

examination_example.sentence: His father was a clerk in the British Navy pay office — a respectable <highlight>position</highlight>, but with little social status.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的父亲是英国海军薪酬办公室的一名职员--一个体面的职位，但没有什么社会地位。

examination_example.sentence: Indeed, women hold only 14 percent of <highlight>positions</highlight> on European corporate boards.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，女性在欧洲公司董事会中仅占14%的职位。

examination_example.sentence: They gave justices permanent <highlight>positions</highlight> so they would be free to upset those in power and have no need to cultivate political support.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们给法官永久性的职位，因此法官不会担心得罪当权者，也不需要培植政治上的支持。

examination_example.sentence: The Eisenhower Executive Office Building (EEOB) commands a unique <highlight>position</highlight> in both the national history and the architectural heritage of the United States.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艾森豪威尔行政办公大楼在美国国家历史和建筑遗产中都具有独特的地位。

examination_example.sentence: Complex international, economic, technological and cultural changes could start to diminish the leading <highlight>position</highlight> of English as the language of the world market.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 复杂的国际、经济、技术和文化的变化可能开始削弱英语作为国际市场语言的主导地位。

examination_example.sentence: The global <highlight>position</highlight> of English is so stable that the young generations of the United Kingdom do not need additional language capabilities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英语的全球地位是如此稳定，以至于英国的年轻一代不需要额外的语言能力。

sense_info_list.en: a person's particular point of view or attitude toward something

examination_example.sentence: Having asserted your opinion (as a <highlight>position</highlight>, not as a fact) demonstrate equal curiosity about other views.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 声明你的意见之后（作为一种观点，而不是一个事实），对其他观点表现出同样的好奇心。

examination_example.sentence: Now we can understand each other's <highlight>positions</highlight> and recognize our shared values, since we both care about needy workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在我们可以理解彼此的立场，并认识到我们共同的价值观，因为我们都关心贫困的工人。

examination_example.sentence: None of these tricks will help you understand them, their <highlight>positions</highlight> or the issues that divide you, but they can help you win.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些技巧都不能帮助你理解他们、了解他们的立场或明白让你们产生分歧的问题，但它们可以帮助你获胜。

examination_example.sentence: The daguerreotype photographic method could take several minutes to complete, resulting in blurred images as sitters shifted <highlight>position</highlight> or adjusted their limbs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 达盖尔银版照相法可能需要几分钟时间才能完成，而当坐着的人变换姿势或调整四肢时，就会导致图像模糊。

sense_info_list.en: a situation or set of circumstances
a place in a race, competition, or test, when compared to others

word_usage.usage: 对比job来说，position通常指机构中的职位，尤指高级职位，通常不用以指一般的工作。该词亦常用于工作申请、职位说明和招聘广告中。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“职业、岗位”，一般指某种特定工作。
意为“行当、行业、手艺”，尤指需要技术性劳动的工作。
意为“行业、（职业正规的）工作、（赖以为生的）正业”，尤指一个人特别适合或尤其有资格胜任的职业。
意为“生涯”，常指终身从事的工作或职业。
意为“职业、行业、专业”，正式用语，指受高等教育和特别训练的工作。
意为“工作、事儿”，可数名词。
意为“工作、事儿”，为不可数名词。
意为“职业、行业、专业”，正式用语。
指物自身位置，没有与他物相关的意思在内。如，我们说到房屋的situation时，通常想到这房屋与其他房屋相比较时的高低远近；我们说到书本的position时，却仅说及书本自身的位置，与其他物体的位置无关，situation指与其他事物相比所处的位置，因而又有处境、环境的意思。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 当前位置；现行立场；(财务等的)流通状况

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 位置；方位；地点；姿势；位置安排；安置方式；处境；状况；观点；立场；头寸；额度；持有状态；命题；原则；主张

word_family.mean: v. 形成；构成；摆出姿态；把…难住；使为难；冒充；装腔作势；假装；卖弄；提出

examination_example.sentence: If you were in a management or leadership <highlight>position</highlight>, never take all the credit for accomplishments or achievements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你处于管理或领导位置，不要把所有的成就都归功于自己。

examination_example.sentence: This can be done through dialogues where parents take the <highlight>position</highlight> of mentors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可以通过对话来实现，在对话中父母扮演导师的角色。

examination_example.sentence: The company pledged to cut 600 back-office <highlight>positions</highlight>, though some 150 workers in those roles would be reassigned to other jobs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该公司承诺削减600个后勤职位，尽管大约有150名担任这些职位的员工将被调任到其他职位。

examination_example.sentence: When you're at <highlight>Position</highlight> 7, your time is better spent connecting with people who are at Positions 6 and 8.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你处于位置7时，你最好把时间花在与位置6和8的人联系上。

examination_example.sentence: You find yourself at <highlight>Position</highlight> 7, then there is little sense in trying to convince someone at <highlight>Position</highlight> 1.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你发现自己处于第7位，那么试图说服处于第1位的人是没有意义的。

examination_example.sentence: On the other, of the steps that needed to be taken to consolidate his own <highlight>position</highlight> as a player in that field.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，他需要采取哪些步骤来巩固自己在该领域的地位。

examination_example.sentence: Macy's hopes Bluemercury will help strengthen its <highlight>position</highlight> in the category.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 梅西百货公司希望 Bluemercury 将有助于巩固其在该类别中的地位。

sense_info_list.en: a person's particular point of view or attitude toward something

examination_example.sentence: The further away an idea is from your current <highlight>position</highlight>, the more likely you are to reject it outright.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个想法离你现在的位置越远，你就越有可能彻底拒绝它。

examination_example.sentence: When confronted with an uncomfortable set of facts, the tendency is often to double down on their current <highlight>position</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当面对一系列令人不安的事实时，人们往往倾向于加倍关注他们目前的立场。

sense_info_list.en: a situation or set of circumstances, especially one that affects one's power to act

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Only about one-in-five say women's family responsibilities are a major reason why there aren't more females in top leadership <highlight>positions</highlight> in business and politics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只有大约五分之一的人说，女性的家庭责任是商业和政治领域没有更多女性担任高层领导职务的主要原因。

examination_example.sentence: Similar shares say the electorate (选民) and corporate America are just not ready to put more women in top leadership <highlight>positions</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 类似的观点表示，选民和美国企业界还没有做好准备让更多的女性担任最高领导职位。

examination_example.sentence: While 53% believe men will continue to hold more top executive <highlight>positions</highlight> in business in the future, 44% say it's only a matter of time before as many women are in top executive <highlight>positions</highlight> as men.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然53%的人认为未来男性将继续在企业中担任更多的高层管理职位，但44%的人表示，女性与男性高管数量齐平只是时间问题。

examination_example.sentence: In one study, students were told their social <highlight>position</highlight> in school is not unchangeable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一项研究中，学生被告知他们在学校的社会地位不是一成不变的。

examination_example.sentence: It's easier and less risky for those in <highlight>positions</highlight> of power to choose to hand awards and funding to those people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于那些处于权力位置的人来说，选择将奖项和资金交给那些人是更容易和风险更小的。

examination_example.sentence: Mail companies are logistics (物流) companies, which puts them in a special <highlight>position</highlight> to help when disaster strikes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 邮件公司是物流公司，这一点使他们在灾难发生的时候处在了一个特殊的地位。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I’m calling to ask about the <highlight>position</highlight> advertised in Friday’s DailyMail.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我打电话来是想问一下《每日邮报》周五刊登的招聘广告。

examination_example.sentence: The reason I'm calling is that we'd like to offer you the <highlight>position</highlight> you were interviewed for last Thursday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我打来电话，是因为想给你提供上周四你面试过的职位。

examination_example.sentence: Some <highlight>positions</highlight> require students to be 15 to 24 or up to 29 for persons with a disability.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些职位要求学生年龄在15到24岁之间，或者29岁以下的残疾人。

examination_example.sentence: Changes in people's social <highlight>positions</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们社会地位的改变

examination_example.sentence: I didn't come from a family with wealth or <highlight>position</highlight>, but I did manage to get a master's degree in fine arts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不是出身于富有或地位显赫的家庭，但我确实获得了美术硕士学位。

examination_example.sentence: In a wired world with constant global communication, we're all <highlight>positioned</highlight> to see flashes of genius wherever they appear.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: All of them described the black dot and tried to explain its <highlight>position</highlight> and something like that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们都描述了那个黑点，并试图解释它的位置之类的东西。

examination_example.sentence: They send messages to your brain about the <highlight>position</highlight> of your head.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们向你的大脑发送关于你头部位置的信息。

examination_example.sentence: To show the <highlight>positions</highlight> of the big and old trees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 显示大树和老树的位置。

examination_example.sentence: Art director was a well-paid <highlight>position</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艺术总监是一个高薪职位。

examination_example.sentence: Yes, the <highlight>position</highlight> is still open.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是的，这个职位仍然空缺。

examination_example.sentence: After graduating from college, Shameem got a <highlight>position</highlight> in non-profit organization(非营利性组织)working to help women in rural(农村的)areas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大学毕业后，Shameem在一家致力于帮助农村妇女的非营利组织中找到了一份工作。

examination_example.sentence: Four great inventions and their <highlight>position</highlight> in the history of human civilization.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 四大发明及其在人类文明史上的地位。

examination_example.sentence: They make China own an important and even top <highlight>position</highlight> in the history of human civilization (文明).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们让中国在人类文明史上拥有重要的甚至是最高的地位。

examination_example.sentence: As time goes by,they have become a symbol（象征）of wealth and <highlight>position</highlight>（地位）in society.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着时间的推移，苏铁已经成为社会财富和地位的象征。

examination_example.sentence: You can pose in a variety of <highlight>positions</highlight> with your arms and legs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以用胳膊和腿摆出各种姿势。

examination_example.sentence: Carrying a heavy load improperly can lead to poor body <highlight>position</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不适当地搬运重物会导致身体姿势不佳.

examination_example.sentence: I'm sure that you'll find yourself in a better <highlight>position</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我相信你会发现自己有一个更好的处境。
